text: Image:Area_code_ND.png|right|Map of North Dakota area code in blue (with border states and provinces) poly 0 0 106 0 106 36 0 30 Area code 306 poly 109 1 107 34 239 35 298 32 297 0 Area code 204 poly 241 36 298 33 300 144 296 142 284 147 283 154 278 154 274 146 261 146 255 110 254 92 247 75 245 50 Area code 218 poly 260 148 264 156 267 171 265 182 256 189 263 198 297 198 299 145 297 144 285 147 284 155 278 153 273 148 Area code 320 poly 30 175 208 177 266 176 260 187 264 199 30 198 Area code 605 poly 0 32 34 33 28 196 28 199 1 199 Area code 406 desc top-right Area code 701 is an area code for the U.S. State of North Dakota. It is the only area code in North Dakota. It was one of the first area codes because it was created in 1947. The area code will have no more space by 2035.April 2017 NANPA relief analysis ==Service area and central office prefixes== * Abercrombie: 553 * Absaraka: 896 * Adams: 944 * Alamo: 528 * Alexander:
